responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[70199B914E7E03A9706A1499CF20B1FD]", "04901B6841626961D812A4A40A91EC2B", "Take a look at this big beauty gone belly up on the sand. I\'ve seen some bigguns wash up around here, but this one\'s surely the largest I\'ve seen. And they\'ve only gotten bigger since we\'ve been here. But Nahzra be dammed if she was wasn\'t once swimming majestic in the deep waters. No use letting her rot... or worse still. Many a sad fate for a leviathan\'s last day.")
name: EVT_TUR_0007_BellyBeast_Savi_DLG_2_Response
